description: A Trickster Company design to empower Indigenous communities, and bring their craft and love for the outdoors. Our Sockeye Season Trucker Hat features a comfier, more relaxed fit and a Merino/TENCEL™ Lyocell fiber mesh lining for better sweat management, odor resistance, and temperature regulation. We’ve worked to keep this style sustainable with a curved brim made with Bureo NetPlus® material, made of 100% recycled fishing nets. A mesh backing helps keep things breathable—ideal for those long days under the sun.
name: Sockeye Season Trucker Hat

specs.value: 53% Merino Wool 47% Lyocell - Exclusive of Decoration
